comments: Gobert (MIN) establishes himself in Jones Jr.'s (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Jones Jr. (DAL) grazes Edwards' (MIN) right arm during his driving shot attempt.
Doncic (DAL) draws Towns (MIN) into the air towards him and contact occurs while he is in a shooting motion.
Jones Jr. (DAL) deflects the ball out of bounds.
Edwards (MIN) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.

Irving (DAL) gathers the ball while stepping back on his left foot, and comes to a stop on his first step (his right) with both feet on the floor. He then lifts his right foot, establishing his left as his pivot and releases the ball to start his dribble.
Gobert (MIN) does not establish a legal screening position in Jones Jr.'s (DAL) path. However, Jones Jr. slips the contact and therefore no foul is warranted.
Gobert (MIN) maintains a legal guarding position on Irving (DAL) and Irving loses the ball on his own accord.
Gafford (DAL) is stepping toward Conley (MIN) and makes lower body contact that dislodges him from his position.

Edwards (MIN) fouls Doncic (DAL) before he has gathered the ball, extending his hand across Doncic's arm as he attempts to gather.  Since MIN is in the penalty, the basket should have been wiped and Doncic should have taken two free throws.
Irving (DAL) grazes Reid's (MIN) arm during the layup attempt.
Reid (MIN) and Gafford (DAL) mutually engage and immediately disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Edwards (MIN) maintains verticality and absorbs the contact that occurs during Doncic's (DAL) layup attempt.

Referees were reasonably certain that the clock malfunctioned, with the ball going out of bounds prior to the clock reaching 00:00.  The clock was adjusted to two tenths of a second and play resumed with DAL possession following the out of bounds.
